email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Sugar Shipment - Rio de Janeiro to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to offer a quote for the shipment of 20,000 MT of sugar from Rio de Janeiro to Singapore under CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is $50 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the SWEET DREAM, which has a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 220m. Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements for the laycan or loading window.

Best regards,
Maria Lopez
Ocean Freight Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Sugar Shipment - Rio de Janeiro to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems reasonable, but we are looking to secure a long-term agreement and can commit to multiple shipments over the next year.

Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount considering our volume commitment? Also, could you provide the demurrage rate per day?

Thanks,
Alex Winter
Shipping Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Sugar Shipment - Rio de Janeiro to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for your interest in a long-term agreement. Considering your volume commitment, we can offer a revised rate of $47 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be $12,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details on the laycan or stem.

Best regards,
Maria Lopez
Ocean Freight Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Sugar Shipment - Rio de Janeiro to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of $47 per metric ton is more in line with our expectations. However, we need to ensure that the demurrage rate is reasonable. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best,
Alex Winter
Shipping Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Sugar Shipment - Rio de Janeiro to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

The laytime will start on 2023-10-01 and end on 2023-10-10. We can offer a laytime of 7 days with the demurrage rate of $12,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Maria Lopez
Ocean Freight Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Sugar Shipment - Rio de Janeiro to Singapore - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Thanks,
Alex Winter
Shipping Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Sugar Shipment - Rio de Janeiro to Singapore - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Maria Lopez
Ocean Freight Services

Hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 12000 MT of LPG from Rotterdam to Houston under DAP terms. We understand that your vessel, the SEA CLOUD, might be available. Could you confirm its current position and expected availability? Also, can you provide the initial freight quote?

email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thanks for your inquiry. The SEA CLOUD is currently in Antwerp and could be positioned to Rotterdam for your laycan, ideally starting from November 15. The initial freight quote for the shipment would be USD 55 per metric tonne. Kindly note that this rate includes fuel but not any potential demurrage charges, should they arise.

Let me know your thoughts or if you need further details!

Alex

Let me know if this works for you.
Cheers,
Alex

Alex Martinez
Ocean Freight Services

Can you provide a revised quote considering these factors?

Emma Jones

Please let us know if this meets your approval so we can proceed with the necessary documentation and finalize the schedule.

If these terms are acceptable, I suggest we finalize our agreement to secure the vessel for your shipment. Please let us know your decision at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Alex Martinez

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Frozen Shrimp Shipment: ARCTIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Martin Lee,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer our freight quote for the transportation of 5000MT of frozen shrimp from Busan to Miami under CFR terms. The vessel proposed for this shipment is ARCTIC STAR, with a DWT of 72000.

Our starting freight quote is USD 85.00 per metric ton.

We look forward to your feedback and are ready to finalize the arrangements at your earliest convenience.

Best Regards,
Samuel Davidson
Ocean Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Frozen Shrimp Shipment: ARCTIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Samuel,

Thank you for the quick response. Considering the handling requirements for frozen shrimp, could there be a possibility to review the rate? Our operations are streamlined for this type of cargo, which significantly reduces handling costs and time.

Could you please consider this factor in the quote? Looking forward to a revised proposition.

Best regards,
Martin Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Review for Frozen Shrimp Shipment: ARCTIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Martin,

Thank you for your points regarding the cargo-handling efficiency. After considering the streamlined operations you've described, I am able to offer a revised rate of USD 82.50 per MT. This adjustment reflects the reduced handling requirement at both ports.

Please let us know if this meets your approval so we can proceed with the necessary documentation and finalize the schedule.

Warm regards,
Samuel Davidson

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Frozen Shrimp Shipment: ARCTIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Hello Samuel,

Appreciate the revised quote at USD 82.50 per MT. I would like to request further details on the demurrage terms and the vessel's LOA to ensure there won't be issues during berthing at Miami.

Also, could you confirm the laycan period remains as previously stated? A precise schedule is crucial for our operations.

Thank you,
Martin Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Details & Finalization of Frozen Shrimp Shipment: ARCTIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Martin,

Thank you for your continued cooperation. I can confirm that the LOA of ARCTIC STAR is 220m, fully compatible with the docking facilities at Miami. Regarding demurrage, we propose a rate of USD 15,000 per day, applicable only if there's a delay beyond the agreed laydays, which remains as November 25-30.

If these terms are acceptable, I suggest we finalize our agreement to secure the vessel for your shipment. Please let us know your decision at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Samuel Davidson

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Frozen Shrimp Shipment Agreement: ARCTIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Samuel,

Everything looks good, and we accept the terms outlined, including the demurrage rate. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork. We are keen to finalize everything promptly to ensure a smooth operation of the shipment.

Thank you for all your efforts in accommodating our requests.

Best regards,
Martin Lee

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - Port Hedland to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to offer a quote for the shipment of 9500MT of Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Rotterdam under CFR terms. Our initial freight rate is USD 45 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the IRON LADY, which has a DWT of 210000 and LOA of 330m. Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements for the laycan or loading window.

Best regards,
Emily Smith
Sea Link Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - Port Hedland to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems a bit high for our current budget. We are looking to secure a long-term agreement and can commit to multiple shipments over the next year.

Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount considering our volume commitment? Also, could you provide the demurrage rate per day?

Thanks,
James Williams
Iron Ocean Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - Port Hedland to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for your interest in a long-term agreement. Considering your volume commitment, we can offer a revised rate of USD 42 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be USD 12,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details on the laycan or stem.

Best regards,
Emily Smith
Sea Link Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - Port Hedland to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:

Best,
James Williams
Iron Ocean Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - Port Hedland to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

The laytime will start on 2023-06-01 and end on 2023-06-15. We can offer a laytime of 7 days with the demurrage rate of USD 12,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Emily Smith
Sea Link Brokers
